params.amount: The initial amount of token to create into beneficiaries wallet
params.maxSupply: the overall max supply for this particular token-id
the overall max supply for this particular token-id
params.newSupply: the new max-supply that would be created

balanceOf(address,uint256).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOf}. Requirements: - `account` cannot be the zero address.

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.

create(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,s.details: Creates a new token with max supply, mints $amount into $to address

params.amount: The initial amount of token to create into beneficiaries wallet
params.maxSupply: the overall max supply for this particular token-id
params.to: Beneficiary of the initial token creation
params.tokenUri: the token-uri for the particular token-id

exists(uint256).details: Indicates whether any token exist with a given id, or not.

mint(uint256,uint256,bytes).details: Mints token into msg.sender for existing tokenId to a specific beneficiary maximum supply may not exceed maxTokenSupplies[tokenId]

mintTo(address,uint256,uint256,bytes).details: Mints token at beneficiary-address for existing tokenId to a specific beneficiary maximum supply may not exceed maxTokenSupplies[tokenId]

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

totalSupply(uint256).details: Total amount of tokens in with a given id.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

ErrInitialSupplyGreaterThanNaxSupply(uin.notice: Initial supply `amount` is greater than max-supply `maxSupply`

ErrInvalidSignature().notice: Either signature is wrong or parameters have been corrupted

ErrTokenAlreadyExists(uint256).notice: Token `tokenId` already exists, use mint instead

ErrTokenNotExists(uint256).notice: A token with Token-ID `tokenId` has not been created yet.

createMessage(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Helper that creates the message that signer needs to sign to allow a mint         this is usually also used when creating the allowances, to ensure "message"         is the same

createMessage(address,uint256,uint256,st.notice: Helper that creates the message that signer needs to sign to allow a mint         this is usually also used when creating the allowances, to ensure "message"         is the same
